title: Redundancy and Cognitive Load Management Strategies: Experimental Learning-Based Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theories and Experience in Mathematics Instruction
context.additional_context: Customized math instructional design competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between redundancy types (modality/code) and learning outcomes through a 2x2 experimental design
Learners can critically evaluate redundancy elements in mathematics instructional materials based on Cognitive Load Theory
Learners can analyze experimental results to predict interaction effects between modality redundancy and code redundancy
Learners can design 20+ mathematics problems in an LMS environment while applying optimal redundancy strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
